title: SMC_AxisDistanceAxes (Enum)
text:
TYPE SMC_AxisDistanceAxes :
Determines which axes are considered for transition mode
MC_TRANSITION_MODE.TMAxisDistance
.
Attributes:
qualified_only

rows.Name: KINEMATIC
rows.Comment:
Only the kinematic axes are considered.  This has the consequence
that the path is not altered if additional axes are added to
a movement.

rows.Name: KINEMATIC_AND_ADDITIONAL
rows.Comment: The kinematic and additional axes are considered.
